sqlMap.select: SELECT PLNAME AS name,SUM(STATUS) AS surplustotal FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(PL.NAME,'未分配') AS PLNAME, IFNULL(PL.ID,-1) AS PLID, PV.STATUS FROM ( SELECT PARKING_CODE, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(STATUS ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC,ID DESC),',',1) AS STATUS, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(CAMERA_IP ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC,ID DESC),',',1) AS CAMERA_IP, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(CREATE_TIME ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC,ID DESC),',',1) AS CREATE_TIME, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(PLATE_NO ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC,ID DESC),',',1) AS PLATE_NO, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(IN_TIME ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC,ID DESC),',',1) AS IN_TIME FROM T_PARKING_VIDEO GROUP BY PARKING_CODE ) PV INNER JOIN T_PARKING_GARAGE PG ON PG.CODE = PV.PARKING_CODE INNER JOIN T_PARKING_LOT_AREA PLA ON PG.PARKING_LOT_AREA_ID = PLA.ID INNER JOIN T_PARKING_LOT PL ON PLA.PARKING_LOT_ID = PL.ID WHERE PG.IS_DELETE=0 AND PLA.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.COMPANY_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#companyCode#,'%') ) SurplusTotal GROUP BY PLID,PLNAME ORDER BY PLID DESC

SELECT PT.$selectType$NAME AS name,INCAR.innum,OUTCAR.outnum FROM ( SELECT PL.NAME AS PLNAME,PL.ID AS PLID,PAS.NAME AS PASNAME,PAS.ID AS PASID FROM T_PARKING_LOT PL INNER JOIN T_PASSAGES PAS ON PL.ID=PAS.PARKINGLOT_ID WHERE PAS.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.COMPANY_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#companyCode#,'%') ) PT
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) innum, $selectType$.ID AS $selectType$ID FROM T_PARKING_ORDER PO INNER JOIN T_PASSAGES PAS ON PO.IN_SCHOOL_DOOR_NAME=PAS.CODE INNER JOIN T_PARKING_LOT PL ON PL.ID=PAS.PARKINGLOT_ID WHERE PAS.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.COMPANY_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#companyCode#,'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(PO.IN_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= #startDate#
AND DATE_FORMAT(PO.IN_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= #endDate#
GROUP BY $selectType$.ID ) INCAR ON INCAR.$selectType$ID=PT.$selectType$ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) outnum, $selectType$.ID AS $selectType$ID FROM T_PARKING_ORDER PO INNER JOIN T_PASSAGES PAS ON PO.OUT_SCHOOL_DOOR_NAME=PAS.CODE INNER JOIN T_PARKING_LOT PL ON PL.ID=PAS.PARKINGLOT_ID WHERE PAS.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.COMPANY_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#companyCode#,'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(PO.OUT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= #startDate#
AND DATE_FORMAT(PO.OUT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= #endDate#
GROUP BY $selectType$.ID ) OUTCAR ON OUTCAR.$selectType$ID=PT.$selectType$ID WHERE 1=1
AND PT.PLID=#selectId#
GROUP BY PT.$selectType$NAME,INCAR.innum,OUTCAR.outnum ORDER BY PT.$selectType$NAME

SELECT PT.$selectType$NAME AS name, SUM(ysPayAmount) AS yspayamount, SUM(ssPayAmount) AS sspayamount FROM ( SELECT SUM(YS_PAY_AMOUNT) AS ysPayAmount, SUM(SS_PAY_AMOUNT) AS ssPayAmount, IFNULL($selectType$.ID,-1) AS $selectType$ID, IFNULL($selectType$.NAME,'未分配') AS $selectType$NAME FROM T_PARKING_ORDER PO INNER JOIN T_PASSAGES PAS ON PO.IN_SCHOOL_DOOR_NAME=PAS.CODE INNER JOIN T_PARKING_LOT PL ON PL.ID=PAS.PARKINGLOT_ID WHERE PAS.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.COMPANY_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#companyCode#,'%') AND (IN_SCHOOL_DOOR_NAME IS NOT NULL OR (OUT_SCHOOL_DOOR_NAME IS NOT NULL AND IN_SCHOOL_DOOR_NAME IS NULL))
AND PL.ID=#selectId#
AND DATE_FORMAT(PO.PAY_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= #startDate#
AND DATE_FORMAT(PO.PAY_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= #endDate#
GROUP BY IFNULL($selectType$.ID,-1), IFNULL($selectType$.NAME,'未分配')
UNION ALL
SELECT SUM(YS_PAY_AMOUNT) AS ysPayAmount, SUM(SS_PAY_AMOUNT) AS ssPayAmount, IFNULL($selectType$.ID,-1) AS $selectType$ID, IFNULL($selectType$.NAME,'未分配') AS $selectType$NAME FROM T_PARKING_ORDER PO INNER JOIN T_PASSAGES PAS ON PO.IN_SCHOOL_DOOR_NAME=PAS.CODE INNER JOIN T_PARKING_LOT PL ON PL.ID=PAS.PARKINGLOT_ID WHERE PAS.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.COMPANY_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#companyCode#,'%') AND (IN_SCHOOL_DOOR_NAME IS NULL AND OUT_SCHOOL_DOOR_NAME IS NULL)
AND PL.ID=#selectId#
AND DATE_FORMAT(PO.PAY_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= #startDate#
AND DATE_FORMAT(PO.PAY_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= #endDate#
GROUP BY IFNULL($selectType$.ID,-1), IFNULL($selectType$.NAME,'未分配') ) PT GROUP BY PT.$selectType$ID,PT.$selectType$NAME ORDER BY PT.$selectType$ID DESC
